overview:
## Discussion

You must add the Family Controls entitlement to your app before you call the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/FamilyControls/AuthorizationCenter] class’s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/FamilyControls/AuthorizationCenter/requestAuthorization(completionHandler:)] or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/FamilyControls/AuthorizationCenter/revokeAuthorization(completionHandler:)] methods.

Adding the Family Controls capability to your app automatically sets this entitlement. Before submitting your app to the App Store, you must [https://developer.apple.com/contact/request/family-controls-distribution] to use the entitlement. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Xcode/adding-capabilities-to-your-app].

# Family Controls

**Property List Key**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the app can request or revoke authorization to provide parental controls.

## Discussion

You must add the Family Controls entitlement to your app before you call the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/FamilyControls/AuthorizationCenter] class’s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/FamilyControls/AuthorizationCenter/requestAuthorization(completionHandler:)] or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/FamilyControls/AuthorizationCenter/revokeAuthorization(completionHandler:)] methods.

Adding the Family Controls capability to your app automatically sets this entitlement. Before submitting your app to the App Store, you must [https://developer.apple.com/contact/request/family-controls-distribution] to use the entitlement. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Xcode/adding-capabilities-to-your-app].
title: Family Controls
